casebody.data:
STATE
v.
George W. BALDWIN. No. 47P02-5. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 6, 2005. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, Robert F. Johnson, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 31st day of August 2005 by Defendant for "Application for Further Review of the Decision of the NC Court of Appeals":

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of October 2005."
